name: vImage_YpCbCrToARGBMatrix
desc: A 3 x 3 matrix for converting Y'CbCr signals to RGB.

items.name: init(Yp: Float, Cr_R: Float, Cr_G: Float, Cb_G: Float, Cb_B: Float)
items.desc: Creates a 3 x 3 matrix for converting Y'CbCr signals to RGB.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a 3 x 3 zero matrix for converting Y'CbCr signals to RGB.

items.name: var Yp: Float
items.desc: The Yp value in the conversion matrix.

items.desc: The Cr_R value in the conversion matrix.

items.desc: The Cr_G value in the conversion matrix.

items.name: var Cb_G: Float
items.desc: The Cb_G value in the conversion matrix.

items.name: var Cb_B: Float
items.desc: The Cb_B value in the conversion matrix.
